description: Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment to provide 75 residential units of flats and town houses in two blocks ranging from 5 stories to 3 stories and 8,297 sq.m of commercial (Class B1) space in a  new part 5 storey, part 4 storey block.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this decision.
status: Called in by Secretary of State
decision: Called in by Secretary of State
